PluginData.Author: mamba
PluginData.Tooltip: An advanced renaming utility for Space Engineers.
PluginData.Description: This mod enhances block renaming in Space Engineers by adding advanced controls to thrusters and other blocks, allowing you to rename multiple blocks at once with ease. *Features* - Directional Thruster Renaming – Renames based on thrust direction (F, B, U, D, L, R) using "{0}" template. - Sequential Numbering – Advanced numbering with adjustable digit format (e.g., "001"). - Auto-Continue and Grouping – Smart counters that remember where you left off per grid or per block type. - Flexible Separators – Full control over the character between name and number, including completely empty separators.
